DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The primary aim observational study investigate occurrence bleed woman take 0.5 mg estradiol 0.1 mg norethisterone acetate ( NETA ) 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Investigate Occurrence Bleeding Postmenopausal Women Treated With Estradiol/NETA 12 Months
DOC.criteria: Informed consent , permit data process within scope study , obtain patient studyrelated activity Postmenopausal amenorrhoeic woman Treatment previously combine HRT discontinue least 3 month prior start 0.5 mg estradiol 0.1 mg norethisterone acetate treatment
